item.title: The best Prime Day deals for some of The Verge staff’s favorite gadgets
item.description:
Amazon Prime Day 2024 is underway! For more deals we recommend across all categories, check out our full roundup.

Every month or so, we like to ask our staff about their favorite stuff — whether it’s board games, smart tech, or kitchen gadgets. And the results are usually very different, very interesting, and a lot of fun.

Since Amazon is currently pushing a lot of deals through its current Prime Day sales, we looked through some of our recent “favorites” articles and found deals on a lot of the devices we like. So we thought we’d list a few in case you have read about them in the past and thought, well, that sort of sounds good, but it’s a bit pricey. (Or — that’s pretty cheap, but maybe I’ll wait until the price goes down some...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Barbara Krasnoff

item.title: The best smart home Prime Day deals you can get right now
item.description:
Amazon’s Prime Day 2024 runs from Tuesday, July 16th, through Wednesday, July 17th, and is an excellent way to stock up on smart home gear. I spent hours sifting through the best deals to bring you my picks for the best buys.

Grab some serious bargains on robot vacuums, smart kitchen gadgets, and lots of smart plugs. Plus, smart lighting favorites Philips Hue and Lutron Caséta have some select savings on their popular products. Read on for all the latest deals, and be sure to check back, as I’ll keep this updated throughout the sale.

Best deals on Amazon Echo devices

  • Several of my favorite Echo smart speakers and displays are on sale this Prime Day. If you’re looking for good sound and a smart home hub that adds support for T...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy

item.title: Elon Musk Says He Will Move X and SpaceX Headquarters Out of California - The Wall Street Journal
item.description:
1. Elon Musk Says He Will Move X and SpaceX Headquarters Out of California  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Elon Musk says he’s moving SpaceX and X out of California  CNN
  3. 'Final straw': Musk plans to pull companies' HQs from Calif. over new law  SFGATE
  4. Elon Musk says X headquarters is moving to Texas, cites California’s gender identity law  KRON4
  5. Elon Musk to move X, SpaceX to Texas over California gender identify law  Axios
